title: 110_s142
content: Amends title XXI (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act (SSA), as amended by the National Institutes of Health Reform Act of 2006, to allow qualifying states to use all or any portion of their allotments under SCHIP for certain Medicaid expenditures. Requires qualifying states to implement at least three of the following policies and procedures: (1) a simplified application process, (2) elimination of any asset test, (3) twelve-month continuous eligibility, and (4) easy access to enrollment staff.
